post.body: Don't know yet if I'm spending NY eve with friends or alone feeding puppies!
We're getting new pups today. I hope these guys will live more than a wk. These are 2 wk shepherd/pit bull pups, so should be more sturdy.
When do you know you're too fat? When the BLANKET you buy to wrap around yourself is too tight!
New Blog Entry: Dogs of 2008: I did a "Dogs of 2007" last year and I liked being able to go back .. http://tinyurl.com/8l62rx
New Blog Entry: Changes: A week ago, 60 Minutes had a segment on Kenya's Sheldrake Wildlife Trust.. http://tinyurl.com/7bmgjl
Friend of friend 60-ish in sexual affair for the 1st time in yrs, told friend that she needed to learn about "SUVs" We think she meant STDs
New Blog Entry: The Matinee: A matinee audience is definitely different from an opening night aud.. http://tinyurl.com/7c725v
looks like the puppy may be moving on, temporarily. She needs someone experienced to work with her. Maybe we can make her more adoptable.
Watching "Sound of Music." It's been a long time since I last saw the movie. I still enjoy it.
Saw "Stomp!" this afternoon, which we decided was a 90 minute "Bottles of Chance" (only fans of the band Lawsuit will understand that!)
New Blog Entry: Homecoming: "Where's the restroom?" I calledo out quietly to Walt, as he was retu.. http://tinyurl.com/88584v
Came home to pooping puppy, frustrations with Flip video and my SD card reader. Wish I were back in Santa Barbara.
We are packing up. The world of "babies" is about to fade into a return to the world of Dogs...and the new year. First the 8 hr drive.
New Blog Entry: It takes a village: How many adults does it take to feed a baby who doesn't want .. http://tinyurl.com/84t4c7
Takes 4 people to feed the grandbaby..1 to hold spoon, 1 to make faces, 1 to mimic eating, and 1 w/camera to take pix. Like a village.
Dr. says he can fuel cars with liposuctioned fat. So if I connect my butt to the fuel line and drive all over can I loook like a Supermodel?
My brother-in-law who is a health nut"indulged" in some goodies yesterday and today is sick. I live on junk food and am fine. Lesson there?
New Blog Entry: Yes, it was a grand success: It was a great first Christmas for Brianna, who arri.. http://tinyurl.com/7cskuv
It's the morning after and we're having our trditional Dec. 26 breakfast: leftover pumpkin pie!
Hunting wild gravies: http://tinyurl.com/9cb9up
